website_summaries.verdict: Parents are happy with the effectiveness of this probiotic, but some kids may have issues with their texture and flavor.
pros: Works well to resolve digestive issues and replenish gut flora after antibiotics, parents report
Individually wrapped tablets are a plus when traveling
cons: Some kids don’t like the taste
A few may have trouble chewing them
A few reports of digestive issues like constipation returning after several weeks of use

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately I won’t be buying these again from Amazon. ...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I won’t be buying these again from Amazon. Some of the blister packs are broken and pills are discolored. Not the normal look of this probiotic.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my 9-year-old and I've never seen a probiotic make someone so miserable... gave it a few days to see if it was the product or something else. Tried it myself with the same go distress results. Threw the rest of the package out.
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: I swear this is what has been keeping my kids ...
customer_reviews.text: I swear this is what has been keeping my kids free from sickness this school year! They have not had to miss one day so far. I will keep using this.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: We all take them and I recommend them to patients
customer_reviews.text: Has helped mild frequent abdominal pain with our child- probably mild constipation. I am a family practice provider. While studies have not shown huge benefit with probiotics, the likelihood of harm is very low. We all take them and I recommend them to patients.
customer_reviews.author: Small Town Family

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work, don't buy
customer_reviews.text: I wasted too much money on these, trying to help my children, but They don't work. I purchased a better quality probiotic. I found chewable probiotics at Costco. My doctor approved and my kids love them.
customer_reviews.author: Baba1212

customer_reviews.title: Helps with my daughter's constipation
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old daughter loves the taste of these! She has issues with chronic constipation, and since taking these probiotics regularly, has had a much easier time! I can't ask for much more than that :)
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Helps Daughter Tummy Issues
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has taken miralax for a number of years, and I've been looking for ways to get her off of it. After adding this to her morning breakfast routine, I've been able to slowly decrease her intake of Miralax. I'm moving slowly as not to cause any constipation issues, but so far, I'm pleased with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Nee

customer_reviews.title: Helped so much!
customer_reviews.text: Our son has daily constipation and stomach cramps no matter what he eats due to chronic reflux issues. we started giving him these once every day and not only is he regular without cramps but we’ve been able to wean him off his prescription for the acid with this helping his digestive system!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So happy I bought these!!
customer_reviews.text: How did I live without these children’s probiotic vitamins?! My son has had many digestive issues since he was born (he’s 5 now) and these have helped him have better bowel movements! I’m grateful to God I found them!! I also give them to my daughter because I believe they in them so much! We underestimate the goodness of probiotics i small children and yogurt did not provide enough for my child’s health but these have been like magic for good, soft, bowel movements!! Now I order them monthly and plan to for a long time!
customer_reviews.author: BKG

customer_reviews.title: I've given the powders a try before but she likes this much more and I feel like they are more effective
customer_reviews.text: I had to give this a try since the previous brand was out of stock.I've been giving these to my toddler religiously in combination with elderly syrup as well as vitamins and healthy eating everyday, and this year unlike last year she hasn't gotten sick even though she goes to day care. I've given the powders a try before but she likes this much more and I feel like they are more effective. My daughter likes the flavor quite bit that she asks for it every night .
customer_reviews.author: jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Works great and results were quick
customer_reviews.text: My son was having gastrointestinal problems going on a month. As we waited for test results, we decided to try a probiotic. Culterelle was the highest recommended, and it had the probiotic strand we needed. It worked great. He saw improvements in his stomach issues after just a few days. The taste is good, nothing too sweet, but not horrible. The packaging makes it easy to pack for trips as you can easily tear off just what you need. The price is very reasonable as well. Needless to say, my son will be taking them every day for the foreseeable future!
customer_reviews.author: KDawgTeach

customer_reviews.title: EVERYONE SHOULD TAKE PROBIOTICS!
customer_reviews.text: As someone with crohns disease, I shout my love of probiotics from the rooftops. Until recently, we only gave them to my 4yo when he was having stomach issues like diarrhea. Recently, he was having trouble with constipation and evacuation and so we upped his fiber (you can get a fiber + probiotics from this brand as well, though they're in powder packets instead of a tablet) and we give him this probiotic every night. He loves the taste and his stomach problems have gotten better.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Chewable is better
customer_reviews.text: I had been using the powder packets for years with my daughter. They kept her regulated and were tasteless, but sometimes my daughter wouldn't finish her drink. Then I saw they made chewables. I bought a box to see if they had the same regularity for her, and I'm happy to say they were better. My daughter needs 2 packets a day of the powder, but 1 chewable a day was effective for her. I'll be buying the chewables going forward.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Chiarappi (Morann)

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend for kids
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old loves these. I really like that you can have them take up to 2 a day if needed. I've noticed an improvement in her gut health and overall health since she started taking these. They're dairy free which was a huge plus for me, they don't need to be refrigerated and they melt in your mouth if you don't want the chew them. They do taste like a berry candy so keep out of reach of children that can open the packs by themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Divians

customer_reviews.title: best probiotic thus far
customer_reviews.text: i've tried 4 probiotics so far for my 2 year old who had occasional constipation and this powder is the best. I put it in her morning milk. This with fiber bears cured her constipation. However, since she no longer uses a bottle now at age 3, she drinks much less milk and so we stopped using this probiotic since its unpredictable what beverage or cereal she will actually finish and you can't use this with hot food. So I'm experimenting with probiotic gummies, so far nothing works as well as this.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Wiser

customer_reviews.title: Be careful, some tablet seal may be broken
customer_reviews.text: I have mixed feelings about this product. It’s great price, easy and convenient purchase from Amazon. However, you need to be careful with each tablet. Sometimes there is small crack on a tablet seal so when you open it, the tablet already absorbed moist in the air. The color is not light pink. In that case I will throw that tablet away.
customer_reviews.author: Candice

customer_reviews.title: Disgraceful and good in the same time 😫
customer_reviews.text: Warning..!! Before you give to your children please take a look at the probiotic..!!!! I considered myself one of the first consumer of this probiotic, and honestly I bought a lot of this product and never complain, but “Today” for the first time I feel so disappointed and scare about the quality controls. I took some pictures. Just if you’re consuming this probiotic be really careful.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: kids are "regular" and healthy, yay
customer_reviews.text: my son doesn't mind the taste, but my daughter complains (to be fair, she complains about every probiotic) so i'm taking my 6yo son's word for it as he's expressed a dislike for other brands but enjoys this one. they are healthy as heck, no poops or pukes in 2.5 years, just a few colds. this obvs has to be helping so i'm going with it!
customer_reviews.author: ohmy.nicole

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Started my 5 year old and 2 year old on these this winter to see if they helped with their all around sicknesses. I can’t say 100% but man, they have been so much healthier this winter and even their colds (1 or two max) they have gotten have been so mild it has barely impacted them. I will definitely be buying these again next year to help us through the cold and flu season!
customer_reviews.author: Gloria M. Larsen

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the stomach bugs away!
customer_reviews.text: My son had his first stomach bug since dec. 2016. My sister recommended I start him on these probiotics. My son is 6 and takes this along with his multivitamin every day without any problems. He also has not had a stomach bug since and he is in kindergarten. Also very fast shipping. Arrived the next day. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: M_U

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves them
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my 4 (almost 5) year old. She was pretty gassy and I was starting my almost 1 year old on a probiotic so I figured I would get these for her as well. She LOVES the taste of these and takes them with a Flintstones vitamin. They have really helped her gassiness.
customer_reviews.author: L. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Our 7 year old loves them!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for our 7 year old with belly issues. Things tablets are great, easily chewed and great tasting, plus they’re help with gut health. We are on a subscription plan with these and with no plans of canceling.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Really helps to regulate, without the runs or stomach discomfort.
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian F

customer_reviews.title: The kids didn't mind these probiotics!
customer_reviews.text: My daughters chewed these probiotics once a day with no issues after having taken antibiotics for ear infections. They have since asked for me to order more since they prefer this over the powder version. The thing is these are fairly expensive both in store and on Amazon. I wish the price was lower and I wouldn't hesitate to keep purchasing. I will purchase again if they have to take antibiotics regardless of price but for daily use too pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has been on this probiotic since 2 years old. She is 5 now and takes them every day. She never has complained about taking them or the flavor. They are chewable and small and work really well. Takes about a week for them to fully kick in and every once in awhile she has to take another during the day from her lactose intolerance. Without them she is sick as a dog. Used 3 other brands including prescription and gummies. These have work the best and is why I will continue to buy them.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: So glad I gave them a try!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely convinced that these probiotics have aided tremendously in my efforts to keep my l/o healthy. From last year this time to now we have seen a significant boost in her immune system. Can't say if it will work this well for everyone but for my family we have been convinced!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. & Mrs. Pucciarelli

customer_reviews.title: No more tummy pain.
customer_reviews.text: This helps my 9 year old with her tummy pain and bathroom problems. It also helps keep UTIs away. We also use the powder that you put in your drink. She actually likes it better.
customer_reviews.author: Gods servant

customer_reviews.title: Helped my kiddo
customer_reviews.text: This really helped my kiddo. He 2 and has a real hard time pooping. It will take home a few days to poop and he’ll be in pain. We use this every morning and it’s helped tremendously. The reason I gave 4 stars instead of 5 is because in the images for the nutrition guide, on the serving size it says, “Ages 1-3” and then “Ages 4+” but on the package I received, it only says “3+”. I bought this because online it said it can be given to 2 years olds but the package doesn’t have that.
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Chewables are a great probiotic!
customer_reviews.text: I tried gummy probiotics, culturelle kids powder form and these chewables and my 5 year old loves the chewables the best and I have seen an improvement in her constipation issue where the other products made no difference.
customer_reviews.author: Deirdre Quinones

customer_reviews.title: Used... seal was broken and covered in masking tape.
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived damaged and clearly used. Seal was open and covered in masking tape. I won't be giving these to my kids.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: I buy this every month for my 11 year old son. He’s always had digestive issues. This helps tremendously when nothing else has. He likes the taste and that it’s chewable. Definitely worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Liz J.

customer_reviews.title: Not for the really picky, texture sensitive ones.
customer_reviews.text: I’m sure these are great but my 8 year old daughter hates the taste and texture. I’ve tried to get her to take so many different kinds of probiotics and bought these after my sister had success with my picky niece liking these, but I’m afraid it’s another no go. Oh well. Worth a try.
customer_reviews.author: Linpin

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves these!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these during my daughter's eczma flare up as I read the benefits of a probiotic for eczema. Not sure if it helped her eczema, but I'm happy to report she loves taking these in the morning (I'm pretty sure she thinks they're candy). I was worried she wouldn't eat a chewable, but these have been a big success!
customer_reviews.author: Roslyn

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: My three-year-old has been using these for the last few months, and digestive wise he seems to be doing a lot better. I stopped for a short period of time to make sure it wasn’t just a change in diet, but he went right back to how he was before. So it’s definitely helping.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: It’s good
customer_reviews.text: My kid love this probiotic tablet. He thinks he is getting a treat. Taste is pretty good. I can’t really say whether it works well or not since he doesn’t have any issue going to bathroom. Kids need a good probiotic support Digestive and Immune Health. I always take this whenever we go on a trip.
customer_reviews.author: lauren

customer_reviews.title: It works!!!
customer_reviews.text: My son took this and with in a week of taking every day has become regular!
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work
customer_reviews.text: Started with my 8yo who would get very constipated. Worked well with him, so now my 11yo and 5yo take it too. They all seem to like the taste. I haven't noticed any differences in terms of regularity for the kids who didn't have issues but I feel like if it helped one, it is good for the others.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: WORKED WELL
customer_reviews.text: WORKED WELL FOR MY DAUGHTER`S DIGESTION, SHE HAD CONSTIPATION THE FIRST TIME I ORDERED IT IT DIDN`T ARRIVE IN BUT AMAZON MADE A REPLACEMENT AM THANKFUL THAT I DIDN`T CHOOSE TO BE REFUNDED CUZ IT HELPED ALOT
customer_reviews.author: Diyaa

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I swear by these probiotics. I give my kids one every night. I I swear they don’t ever get sick. When ever I run out. They get sick within a couple days.
customer_reviews.author: Starr

customer_reviews.title: Great kids probiotics
customer_reviews.text: Love this for my toddler who is unable to swallow right now. She loves these and chews them right up. Its pricey but most probiotics are. Luckily every now and then Culturelle will have coupons
customer_reviews.author: Missy2beTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves these
customer_reviews.text: Great taste and easy to chew and swallow! My 5 year old loves them and ever since she has been taking them she hasn’t been sick near as much!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: My picky girls like the flavor. I didn't notice a difference when using but my girls needed a higher strength and had to change. Worth the cost and other family members use and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MPipkin

customer_reviews.title: Great solution for kids
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these things. They are a little pricier than I would prefer to see but they work great, and the kids think they taste great, and they're not chalky. I recommend these to anyone with kids, probiotics are very important! And these are quality at a good dose.
customer_reviews.author: Seth W

customer_reviews.title: Pricey
customer_reviews.text: For a 30 day supply for the price is much more than I would ever want to pay. I should have payed more attention before ordering. You’re supposed to rotate probiotics often anyway, so I’ll be rotating this one out for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gave us painful gas and stomach issues
customer_reviews.text: I don’t find the flavor bad and neither did my daughter but we both had stomach cramps and gas and diarrhea from these. I don’t care if my body needs to adjust...it was painful painful gas that I could not function. So nope for me.
customer_reviews.author: Neednewname

customer_reviews.title: My son loves the taste
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year 9 month old son asks for his pink vitamin every day. He loves the taste. It's a chewable that's a slightly harder consistency than others but he takes it without any issue. I am a big believer in probiotics so this is an important part of our daily routine.
customer_reviews.author: maya81

customer_reviews.title: It can help the child to digest.
customer_reviews.text: The child is already four and a half years old, but he is usually very picky about eating and often has diarrhea. The other children are very healthy now.and it is very sad to look at their own children.I took the child to the hospital for examination,and recommended this brand to me.This probiotics is not powdery,so it is very convenient for children to chewdirectly. After a month of recuperation,the child rarely has diarrhea and begins to grow.I will continue to buy this brand of probiotics for my children.
customer_reviews.author: baizhifeng  HMFF

customer_reviews.title: Caused Cramping
customer_reviews.text: The pediatrician recommended these when my child was taking an antibiotic. Unfortunately, they gave her cramps. We didn't notice any difference in bowel movements when she took these. I switched to just having her eat a yogurt every day and that worked just as well without the cramping. She did like the taste of these so we didn't have to battle over taking them.
customer_reviews.author: DakOdinTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great Kids Probiotics
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to improve my kids digestive issues, would definitely purchase from this brand again since its probably the most tested and safest working probiotic in the market.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My son is 2 and has had stomach issues since he was born. Doctor reccommended to get him on a probioctic and i tried others and this is the only one that seems to work for him and he loves the taste of the berry flavor!
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: My kids love them
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these and have the best immune systems since I started giving them these daily.

customer_reviews.title: Daughter likes them. No difficulty getting her to take ...
customer_reviews.text: Daughter likes them. No difficulty getting her to take them. Tummy aches disappeared after several months and some dietary changes. These may have helped with that but I cannot say for sure. Used to get a larger quantity for less at Costco but they do not have them right now.

customer_reviews.title: Not affective
customer_reviews.text: The doctor suggested my daughter takes this and it will help Her with mood swings and her behavior issues but it did not! Waste of money

customer_reviews.title: Love th automatic delivery
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter's doctor recommended a pro biotic for her. I am on automatic delivery to ensure I don't run out.

customer_reviews.title: Amazon had the best price for this product
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this product after it came highly recommended by our pediatrician as our child was put on antibiotics. I looked at a few brick and mortar stores, but they were very expensive for this product. Some places charged double what Amazon charges for it. Amazon definitely has the best price.

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for a friend
customer_reviews.text: My friend wanted to try probiotics, but wanted a milder version. So I got her these. So far she loves them.

customer_reviews.title: Good flavor just a little expensive
customer_reviews.text: Love the product but price is a little high, price on amazon is better than in-store but for the amount provided this product is a little expensive. Will still continue to buy it flavor is good and seems to have good affects for my son.
customer_reviews.author: Arnon Scheflan

customer_reviews.title: Good price and date
customer_reviews.text: We purchase probiotics once for a while when we see good prices. This probiotics has a good best by date in 2 years. We are very satisfied with the price and the expiration date!
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: My toddler had no issues chewing these and seemed to really like the flavor. Didn’t notice much of a difference from her normal probiotic so seems to be a really good product. Will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: MEdwards

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money

customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Great probiotics for kids
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter, age 10, who often has tummy trouble and these have made a huge difference. I rarely hear of any tummy trouble unless she has forgotten to take them.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: They're easy to crunch and must taste at least okay
customer_reviews.text: Our kid likes them. They're easy to crunch and must taste at least okay. They definitely helped his tummy during a prolonged illness, and we've stuck with them to keep up a healthy gut.
customer_reviews.author: MSRP

customer_reviews.title: Trusted brand
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has indigestion, Culturelle very good, every time I gave her this,she got better, so I always keep it
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Probiotics for kiddos.
customer_reviews.text: My kiddos love these. Easy to store and the taste is great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Expired!
customer_reviews.text: This expired 2/19 and I have been giving my kids this.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: worked for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughters after an ear infection and round of antibiotics. Has worked well. Cleared up her soft stools and got her regular again in a couple of days. Still giving them to her on principle. Only down side seems to be that they crumble easily. Sometimes it's hard to get them out of the blister in one piece.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Grandkids love the taste. Easy to cut if needed and it is a good and necessary product for today's fast food addictions.
customer_reviews.author: marilady

product_meta.title: Culturelle Kids Chewable Daily Probiotic for Kids - Natural Berry - Supports Immune, Digestive, and Oral Health - For Age 3+ - Gluten, Dairy, Soy-Free - 30 count
product_meta.description:
Culturelle Probiotics Products

Designed to promote ongoing digestive support as well as everyday wellness for every member of the family. All products in our line-up feature Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG (LGG), the #1 clinically studied probiotic strain.†† 

Explore Our Wide Range of Probiotic Products

Digestive Health
Culturelle Digestive Health probiotic products are formulated to help restore the natural balance of good bacteria in the intestines to help your digestive system work better and keep you feeling your best.* Balancing your Gut Microbiome can start today.

Pro-Well
Be proactive with smart choices today to support your health tomorrow. Taking a Culturelle probiotic for everyday wellness helps promote your daily health and wellness routine.* 

Kids
When your kids have occasional tummy troubles or when you just want to help keep them healthy, reach for the children's probiotic brand most recommended by Pediatricians.††† Our line-up of safe probiotic supplements can help keep your little ones feeling their best.* 

Baby
Your baby’s first two years are critical in building a strong foundation for a lifetime of good health. With safe and gentle products designed to work naturally with your baby’s body, Culturelle Baby products are formulated to help promote your baby’s developing digestive and immune systems supporting your baby for the best possible start.*
feature_bullets: IMMUNE SYSTEM SUPPORT* - The LGG strain in Culturelle has been shown to form a strong barrier in the digestive tract, activating your child’s natural defenses to protect it against nonbeneficial bacteria, helping to keep them healthy.*

HAPPY TUMMIES, HEALTHY KIDS, RELAXED PARENTS. Lactobacillus rhamnosus GG (LGG) - the key ingredient in Culturelle Kids Daily Probiotic Chewables - is clinically proven to help reduce occasional tummy troubles, including diarrhea and occasional digestive upset*
PROVEN EFFECTIVE - Not all probiotics for kids are created equal. Pick Culturelle Kids Chewables, exclusively powered by LGG, the Proven Effective Probiotic.
PROBIOTICS FOR KIDS - From the #1 Pediatrician Recommended Probiotic Brand, Culturelle Kids helps your child’s digestive tract to work better and support a healthy immune system when taken regularly*

EASY FOR YOUR LITTLE ONES TO TAKE - Chew 1 naturally berry flavored tablet daily to support immune and digestive health.* Best for toddlers and children ages 3+ Free of gluten,▴ dairy, lactose, milk, added colors, preservatives, yeast and soy.

specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
